title: Another Time, A Different World
description: Jonathon Grade is a typical teenager living in 1972. His priorities in life consist of girls and cars but that soon changes when he finds a cryptic letter from his dad claiming he has traveled to the future, to the year 2040. Jonathon must find his dad but during his journey what he discovers will change his life forever. The president of the future world saved mankind from extinction but after meeting his love interest Kierra, and the rebels, Jonathon begins to question the president's motives. Everyone must live in sterile buildings, called zones, because the outside world is too contaminated to live in but why? Jonathon discovers a clue that links the president of the future to his own past and finding the answer could cost him everything, including his life.
author: T.D. Whorton
